movies.title: Interstellar
movies.plot: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.

poster.caption: Matthew McConaughey in Interstellar (2014)

movies.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
movies.plot: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

poster.caption: Vin Diesel, Bradley Cooper, Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldaña, and Dave Bautista in Guardians of the Galaxy (2014)

movies.title: Gone Girl
movies.plot: The husband of a missing woman becomes the main suspect in her disappearance.

poster.caption: Ben Affleck and Rosamund Pike in Gone Girl (2014)

movies.title: Whiplash
movies.plot: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

poster.caption: Miles Teller in Whiplash (2014)

movies.title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
movies.plot: As Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world, he teams up with a fellow Avenger and S.H.I.E.L.D agent, Black Widow, to battle a new threat from history: an assassin known as the Winter Soldier.

poster.caption: Samuel L. Jackson, Robert Redford, Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson, and Sebastian Stan in Captain America: The Winter Soldier (2014)

movies.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
movies.plot: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.

poster.caption: The Grand Budapest Hotel (2014)

movies.title: The Imitation Game
movies.plot: During World War II, the English mathematical genius Alan Turing tries to crack the German Enigma code with help from fellow mathematicians while attempting to come to terms with his troubled private life.

poster.caption: Benedict Cumberbatch in The Imitation Game (2014)

movies.title: John Wick
movies.plot: John Wick is a former hitman grieving the loss of his true love. When his home is broken into, robbed, and his dog killed, he is forced to return to action to exact revenge.

poster.caption: Keanu Reeves in John Wick (2014)

movies.title: Edge of Tomorrow
movies.plot: A man fighting in a war against aliens must relive the same day every time he dies until he can find a way to stop their power source with the help of an elite soldier.

poster.caption: Tom Cruise and Emily Blunt in Edge of Tomorrow (2014)

movies.title: X-Men: Days of Future Past
movies.plot: The X-Men send Wolverine to the past in a desperate effort to change history and prevent an event that results in doom for both humans and mutants.

poster.caption: Halle Berry, Patrick Stewart, Ian McKellen, Nicholas Hoult, Hugh Jackman, James McAvoy, Elliot Page, Michael Fassbender, Daniel Cudmore, Bingbing Fan, and Jennifer Lawrence in X-Men: Days of Future Past (2014)

movies.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
movies.plot: A spy organisation recruits a promising street kid into the agency's training program, while a global threat emerges from a twisted tech genius.

poster.caption: Colin Firth, Samuel L. Jackson, Michael Caine, Mark Strong, Sofia Boutella, and Taron Egerton in Kingsman: The Secret Service (2014)

movies.title: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)
movies.originalTitle: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)
movies.plot: A washed-up superhero actor attempts to revive his fading career by writing, directing, and starring in a Broadway production.

poster.caption: Edward Norton, Zach Galifianakis, Amy Ryan, Naomi Watts, Emma Stone, and Andrea Riseborough in Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance) (2014)

movies.title: Nightcrawler
movies.plot: A petty thief desperate for work muscles into the world of crime journalism and becomes the star of his own story as he blurs the line between observer and participant.

poster.caption: Jake Gyllenhaal in Nightcrawler (2014)

movies.title: Ex Machina
movies.plot: A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a highly advanced humanoid A.I.

poster.caption: Alicia Vikander in Ex Machina (2014)

movies.title: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
movies.originalTitle: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
movies.plot: Bilbo Baggins and company are forced to engage in a war against an array of combatants and keep the Lonely Mountain from falling into the hands of a rising darkness.

poster.caption: Martin Freeman in The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies (2014)

movies.title: Fury
movies.plot: A grizzled tank commander makes tough decisions as he and his crew fight their way across Germany in April, 1945.

poster.caption: Brad Pitt, Shia LaBeouf, Logan Lerman, Michael Peña, and Jon Bernthal in Fury (2014)

movies.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
movies.plot: When New York is put under siege by Oscorp, it is up to Spider-Man to save the city he swore to protect as well as his loved ones.

poster.caption: The Amazing Spider-Man 2 (2014)

movies.title: Lucy
movies.plot: A woman who has become accidentally trapped in a dark deal with a mysterious and brutal criminal overlord transforms into a merciless warrior evolved beyond previously known human evolutionary limits and turns the tables on her captors.

poster.caption: Scarlett Johansson in Lucy (2014)

movies.title: American Sniper
movies.plot: Navy S.E.A.L. sniper Chris Kyle's pinpoint accuracy saves countless lives on the battlefield and turns him into a legend. Back home with his family after four tours of duty, however, Chris finds that it is the war he can't leave behind.

poster.caption: Bradley Cooper in American Sniper (2014)

movies.title: The Maze Runner
movies.plot: A teen with no memory of the outside world awakens in a gigantic maze guarded by deadly creatures, and plots a daring escape.

poster.caption: Thomas Brodie-Sangster, Chris Sheffield, Aml Ameen, Alexander Flores, Will Poulter, Kaya Scodelario, Dexter Darden, Dylan O'Brien, Ki Hong Lee, and Blake Cooper in The Maze Runner (2014)

movies.title: Big Hero 6
movies.plot: A special bond develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax and prodigy Hiro Hamada, who together team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

poster.caption: James Cromwell, Kathy Griffin, Scott Adsit, Bridget Hoffman, Kirk Baily, Abraham Benrubi, June Christopher, Cam Clarke, Roy Conli, Dane Cook, David Cowgill, Terri Douglas, Daniel Gerson, Jackie Gonneau, Nicholas Guest, Stan Lee, Yuri Lowenthal, Danny Mann, Tim Mertens, Sundra Oakley, Lynwood Robinson, Maya Rudolph, David Shaughnessy, Shane Sweet, Alan Tudyk, Damon Wayans Jr., Billy Bush, Genesis Rodriguez, Yumi Mizui, James Taku Leung, Jamie Chung, Katie Lowes, Marcella Lentz-Pope, Cooper Cowgill, Kelly Hoover, Daniel Henney, Paul Briggs, Brian Norris, T.J. Miller, Reed Buck, Josie Trinidad, Charlotte Gulezian, Leah Latham, Ryan Potter, Kristen Phaneuf, Marlie Crisafulli, and Michael Powers in Big Hero 6 (2014)

movies.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 1
movies.plot: Katniss Everdeen is in District 13 after she shatters the games forever. Under the leadership of President Coin and the advice of her trusted friends, Katniss spreads her wings as she fights to save Peeta and a nation moved by her courage.

poster.caption: Jennifer Lawrence in The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 1 (2014)

movies.title: Divergent
movies.plot: In a world divided by factions based on virtues, Tris learns she's Divergent and won't fit in. When she discovers a plot to destroy Divergents, Tris and the mysterious Four must find out what makes Divergents dangerous before it's too late.

poster.caption: Shailene Woodley and Theo James in Divergent (2014)

movies.title: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
movies.originalTitle: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
movies.plot: The fragile peace between apes and humans is threatened as mistrust and betrayal threaten to plunge both tribes into a war for dominance over the Earth.

poster.caption: Karin Konoval, Andy Serkis, Terry Notary, Nick Thurston, and Scott Lang in Dawn of the Planet of the Apes (2014)

movies.title: The Theory of Everything
movies.plot: Stephen Hawking gets unprecedented success in the field of physics despite being diagnosed with motor neuron disease at the age of 21. He defeats awful odds as his first wife Jane aids him loyally.

poster.caption: Felicity Jones and Eddie Redmayne in The Theory of Everything (2014)

movies.title: Godzilla
movies.plot: The world is beset by the appearance of monstrous creatures, but one of them may be the only one who can save humanity.

poster.caption: Godzilla (2014)

movies.title: The Equalizer
movies.plot: A man who believes he has put his mysterious past behind him cannot stand idly by when he meets a young girl under the control of ultra-violent Russian gangsters.

poster.caption: Denzel Washington in The Equalizer (2014)

movies.title: 22 Jump Street
movies.plot: After making their way through high school (twice), big changes are in store for officers Schmidt and Jenko when they go deep undercover at a local college.

poster.caption: Channing Tatum and Jonah Hill in 22 Jump Street (2014)

movies.title: The Fault in Our Stars
movies.plot: Hazel and Gus are teenagers who meet at a cancer support group and fall in love. They both share the same acerbic wit and a love of books, especially "An Imperial Affliction", so they embark on a journey to visit an author in Amsterdam.

poster.caption: Shailene Woodley and Ansel Elgort in The Fault in Our Stars (2014)

movies.title: Maleficent
movies.plot: A vengeful fairy is driven to curse an infant princess, only to discover that the child could be the one person who can restore peace to their troubled land.

poster.caption: Angelina Jolie in Maleficent (2014)

movies.title: The Lego Movie
movies.plot: An ordinary LEGO construction worker, thought to be the prophesied as "special", is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil tyrant from gluing the LEGO universe into eternal stasis.

poster.caption: Morgan Freeman, Anthony Daniels, Liam Neeson, Billy Dee Williams, Will Ferrell, Chris McKay, Will Arnett, Elizabeth Banks, Kristen Alderson, Kristen Ariza, David Burrows, Charlie Day, Walt Dohrn, Will Forte, Danny Mann, Christopher Miller, Mike Mitchell, Shaquille O'Neal, Nick Offerman, Chris Pratt, Chris Smith, Peter Sohn, Matthew Terry, Cobie Smulders, Keegan-Michael Key, Channing Tatum, Alison Brie, Keith Ferguson, Jorma Taccone, Jonah Hill, Craig Berry, Dave Franco, Jake Johnson, Kelly Lafferty, Chris Romano, Doug Nicholas, Todd Hansen, Jadon Sand, Melissa Sturm, Chris Paluszek, Leiki Veskimets, Amanda Farinos, Graham Miller, and Kristen Phaneuf in The Lego Movie (2014)

movies.title: How to Train Your Dragon 2
movies.plot: When Hiccup and Toothless discover an ice cave that is home to hundreds of new wild dragons and the mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace.

poster.caption: How to Train Your Dragon 2 (2014)

movies.title: Boyhood
movies.plot: The life of Mason, from early childhood to his arrival at college.

poster.caption: Ellar Coltrane in Boyhood (2014)

movies.title: The Interview
movies.plot: Dave Skylark and his producer Aaron Rapaport run the celebrity tabloid show "Skylark Tonight". When they land an interview with a surprise fan, North Korean dictator Jong-Un Kim, they are recruited by the CIA to assassinate him.

poster.caption: James Franco, Seth Rogen, and Randall Park in The Interview (2014)

movies.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction
movies.plot: When humanity allies with a bounty hunter in pursuit of Optimus Prime, the Autobots turn to a mechanic and his family for help.

poster.caption: Mark Wahlberg, Peter Cullen, Nicola Peltz Beckham, and Jack Reynor in Transformers: Age of Extinction (2014)

movies.title: Neighbors
movies.plot: After they are forced to live next to a fraternity house, a couple with a newborn baby do whatever they can to take them down.

poster.caption: Seth Rogen, Zac Efron, Elise Vargas, and Zoey Vargas in Neighbors (2014)

movies.title: Predestination
movies.plot: As his last assignment, a temporal agent is tasked to travel back in time and prevent a bomb attack in New York in 1975. The hunt, however, turns out to be beyond the bounds of possibility.

poster.caption: Predestination (2014)

movies.title: 300: Rise of an Empire
movies.plot: Greek general Themistocles of Athens leads the naval charge against invading Persian forces led by mortal-turned-god Xerxes and Artemisia, vengeful commander of the Persian navy.

poster.caption: Sullivan Stapleton in 300: Rise of an Empire (2014)

movies.title: It Follows
movies.plot: A young woman is followed by an unknown supernatural force after a sexual encounter.

poster.caption: Jake Weary and Maika Monroe in It Follows (2014)

movies.title: Non-Stop
movies.plot: An air marshal springs into action during a transatlantic flight after receiving a series of text messages demanding $150 million into an off-shore account, or someone will die every 20 minutes.

poster.caption: Liam Neeson in Non-Stop (2014)

movies.title: Noah
movies.plot: Noah is chosen by God to undertake a momentous mission before an apocalyptic flood cleanses the world.

poster.caption: Jennifer Connelly, Russell Crowe, Logan Lerman, Emma Watson, and Ray Winstone in Noah (2014)

movies.title: The Babadook
movies.plot: A single mother and her child fall into a deep well of paranoia when an eerie children's book titled "Mister Babadook" manifests in their home.

poster.caption: Essie Davis and Noah Wiseman in The Babadook (2014)

movies.title: Chef
movies.plot: A head chef quits his restaurant job and buys a food truck in an effort to reclaim his creative talents while piecing his estranged family back together.

poster.caption: John Leguizamo, Sofía Vergara, Jon Favreau, and Emjay Anthony in Chef (2014)

movies.title: RoboCop
movies.plot: In 2028 Detroit, when Alex Murphy, a loving husband, father and good cop, is critically injured in the line of duty, the multinational conglomerate OmniCorp sees their chance for a part-man, part-robot police officer.

poster.caption: Joel Kinnaman in RoboCop (2014)

movies.title: Transcendence
movies.plot: A scientist's drive for artificial intelligence takes on dangerous implications when his own consciousness is uploaded into one such program.

poster.caption: Johnny Depp in Transcendence (2014)

movies.title: Wild Tales
movies.plot: Six short stories that explore the extremities of human behavior involving people in distress.

poster.caption: Rita Cortese, Ricardo Darín, Diego Gentile, Darío Grandinetti, Oscar Martínez, María Marull, Erica Rivas, Leonardo Sbaraglia, Mónica Villa, María Onetto, and Julieta Zylberberg in Wild Tales (2014)

movies.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
movies.plot: When a kingpin threatens New York City, a group of mutated turtle warriors must emerge from the shadows to protect their home.

poster.caption: William Fichtner, Will Arnett, Noel Fisher, Jeremy Howard, Johnny Knoxville, Megan Fox, Alan Ritchson, and Pete Ploszek in Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (2014)

movies.title: Dracula Untold
movies.plot: As his kingdom is being threatened by the Turks, young prince Vlad Tepes must become a monster feared by his own people in order to obtain the power needed to protect his own family, and the families of his kingdom.

poster.caption: Luke Evans in Dracula Untold (2014)

movies.title: PK
movies.plot: An alien on Earth loses the only device he can use to communicate with his spaceship. His innocent nature and child-like questions force the country to evaluate the impact of religious views on people.

poster.caption: Aamir Khan and Anushka Sharma in PK (2014)

movies.title: The Judge
movies.plot: Big-city lawyer Hank Palmer returns to his childhood home where his father, the town's judge, is suspected of murder. Hank sets out to discover the truth; along the way he reconnects with his estranged family.

poster.caption: Robert Downey Jr. and Robert Duvall in The Judge (2014)
